bibl.title: The Birth of the Term 'Magic'.
bibl.note: First part of a lecture delivered at the University of Oslo on 18 September, 1998. The second, 'Christian' part will appear in: J.N. BREMMER (Ed.), The Apocryphal Acts of Andrew (Leuven, 1999). - The birth of magos and mageia. - Pp. 9-12: Appendix: Magic versus Religion.
bibl.seg: BREMMER Jan N., The Birth of the Term 'Magic'.

First part of a lecture delivered at the University of Oslo on 18 September, 1998. The second, 'Christian' part will appear in: J.N. BREMMER (Ed.), The Apocryphal Acts of Andrew (Leuven, 1999). - The birth of magos and mageia. - Pp. 9-12: Appendix: Magic versus Religion.
